data.text: It is believedthat one of the possible reasons for such results is that natural prod-ucts, despite the known antioxidant (pro)vitamins, contain numerousother antioxidants that have strong physiological effect. It is also be-lieved that antioxidants contained in the natural products are impor-tant both because of their individual functions and their synergisticeffects in the body.AIM OF THE STUDY: Knowing the positive effects of green tea on theprevention of some of the chronic diseases that are associated withhigh oxidative stress, our aim was to measure the level of total an-tioxidants in infusions prepared from some frequently used medicinalplants in Republic of Macedonia and to compare the obtained valueswith that of green tea.MATERIAL AND METHODSThe content of total antioxidants was measured in infusions preparedfrom the following medicinal plants: lemon balm (Balm leaf), St. John'swort (Hyperici herba), linden (Tiliae flos), nettle (Urticae folium) andgreen tea (Camellia sinensis). Medicinal plants from Good Nature, Al-kaloid Skopje, were purchased in the local market, packed in filterbags. Infusions prepared from lemon balm, St. John's wort and nettle pickedin Maleshevo Mountains were also analyzed. Preparation of infusions: 0,5g dry plant was poured with 50mL boilingwater and let stand for 15 minutes, covered. The content of total antioxidants was measured by FRAP method, ac-cording to Benzie and Strain. The method is based on the principle197Macedonian Pharmaceutical Bulletin 57 (suppl), 2011MEDICINAL AND AROMATIC PLANTSposter presentationsFIFTH CONGRESS OF PHARMACY OF MACEDONIA WITH INTERNATIONAL PARTICIPATIONthat ferric to ferrous ion reduction at low pH causes production ofcolored ferrous-tripyridyltriazine complex that absorbs at 593nm.Solutions of FeSO4 with known concentrations were used asstandards. The concentration of total antioxidants is expressed asmmol/L FeSO4.RESULTSResults from our measurements once again confirmed the high con-tent of total antioxidants in the infusion prepared from green tea:25,2mmol/L. From the other studied medicinal plants, the infusionprepared from lemon balm (Good Nature, Alkaloid) had particularlyhigh value of total antioxidants, very close to that of green tea: lemonbalm - 19,2mmol/L. Total antioxidants content in the infusions pre-pared from other Macedonian medicinal plants under study, fromGood Nature, Alkaloid, were: St. John's wort - 8,5mmol/L; linden -6,1mmol/L; nettle - 2,9mmol/L.Infusions prepared from lemon balm and nettle picked in MaleshevoMountains gave similar results as commercial medicinal plants: lemonbalm - 19,5mmol/L; nettle - 3,7mmol/L. Exception was the infusionprepared from St. John's wort picked in Maleshevo Mountains that hadhigher content of total antioxidants compared with commercial me-dicinal plant: St. John's wort - 12,6mmol/L.CONCLUSION: Besides well known health effects of our frequentlyused medicinal plants: lemon balm, St. John's wort, linden and nettle,of particular importance is their content of total antioxidants thathas potential to contribute in lowering of free radicals and improve-ment of oxidative status in the body. In this context it is important to remind of our previously publisheddata about total antioxidants level in herbal infusions suitable for un-restricted everyday use (4) that could also contribute in reducing ofoxidative stress.REFERENCES1. Benzie, I. F. F. and Strain, J.J., (1996): The ferric reducing ability of plasma (FRAP)as a measure of antioxidant power: The FRAP assay. Anal Biochem. 239:70-6.2. Dragland, S., Senoo, H., Wake, K., Holte, K. and Blomhoff, R., (2003): Severalculinary and medicinal herbs are important sources of dietary antioxidants. J Nutr.133:1286-90.3. J Nutr. 133:2812-19. 4. Ruskovska, T., Gjorgieva, D., Crcoroska, M. and Kukovska, V., (2011): Totalantioxidants level in caffeine-free herbal infusions suitable for unrestrictedeveryday use. Pharmacia. LVIII, S:80-1.5. Song, F.L., Gan, R.Y., Zhang, Y., Xiao, Q., Kuang, L. and Li, H. B., (2010): Totalphenolic contents and antioxidant capacities of selected chinese medicinal plants.Int J Mol Sci. 11:2362-72.SODRZhINA NA VKUPNIANTIOKSIDANSI VO INFUZIPODGOTVENI OD NEKOI NAJChESTOKORISTENI LEKOVITI RASTENIJA VOREPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJATatjana Rushkovska1, Darinka Gjorgieva1, MarijaTsrtsoroska2, Valentina Kukovska21Fakultet za meditsinski nauki, Univerzitet ,,Gotse Delchev", Shtip2Voeno-meditsinski tsentar, SkopjeVOVEDSlobodnite radikali pretstavuvaat visokoreaktivni i nestabilnipreodni khemiski komponenti koi imaat potentsijal za narushuvanjena khemiskata struktura i funktsijata na lipidite, proteinite inukleinskite kiselini. Poznato e deka slobodnite radikalinormalno se sozdavaat vo tekot na metabolichkite protsesi i deka,vo fizioloshki uslovi, nivnoto shtetno dejstvo vrz biomolekulitee onevozmozheno so aktivnosta na endogenata (pretstavena glavnoso antioksidantnite enzimi) i egzogenata (pretstavena soantioksidansite primeni so khranata) antioksidantna bariera. Vouslovi na osobeno visoka produktsija na slobodni radikali vobioloshkiot sistem i/ili nedostig na edogeni i/ili egzogeniantioksidansi, se javuva sostojba na oksidativen stres za koja edokazhano deka pretstavuva osnova na golem broj khronichnizaboluvanja, vo prv red ateroskleroza, razlichni kartsinomi inevrodegenerativni zaboluvanja. Imajkji ja predvid invo l vi ra no -sta na oksidativniot stres vo patogenezata na pretkhodno spo me na -ti te zaboluvanja, napraveni bea brojni ispituvanja za pot e ntsija l-niot preventiven efekt na antioksidantnite (pro)vitamini: beta-karoten, vitamin S i E. Nekonzistentnite i pretezhno negativnirezultati od vakvite studii, kako i pozitivnite rezultati odistrazhuvanjata za efektot na iskhranata bogata so ovoshje izelenchuk i na zeleniot chaj vrz khronichnite zaboluvanja povrzani sooksidativniot stres, ja favoriziraat upotrebata na prirodniteantioksidansi nasproti sintetichkite preparati. Se smeta dekaedna od mozhnite prichini za vakvite rezultati od istrazhuvanjata etaa shto prirodnite produkti, pokraj poznatite antioksidantni(pro)vitamini, sodrzhat i brojni drugi antioksidansi koi imaatsilno fizioloshko dejstvo. Se smeta isto taka deka antioksi -dansite sodrzhani vo prirodnite produkti se znachajni kako poradisvoite poedinechni funktsii, taka i so nivnoto sinergistichkodejstvo vo organizmot. TsEL NA TRUDOTZnaejkji za pozitivnite efekti na zeleniot chaj vo preventsijata nanekoi od khronichnite zaboluvanja koi se povrzani so visokoksidativen stres, nasha tsel beshe da go izmerime nivoto na vkupniantioksidansi vo infuzi podgotveni od nekoi najchestoupotrebuvani lekoviti rastenija vo Republika Makedonija i da gisporedime dobienite vrednosti so onaa od zeleniot chaj.MATERIJAL I METODISodrzhinata na vkupnite antioksidansi beshe odreduvana voinfuzi podgotveni od slednite lekoviti rastenija: matochina (Balmleaf), kantarion (Hyperici herba), lipa (Tiliae flos), kopriva (Urticaefolium) i zelen chaj (Camellia sinensis). Lekovitite rastenija od Good198Makedonski farmatsevtski bilten 57 (dodatok), 2011MEDITsINSKI I AROMATIChNI RASTENIJA poster prezentatsiiPETTI KONGRES NA FARMATsIJATA SO MEGjUNARODNO UChESTVONature, Alkaloid Skopje, bea nabaveni vo slobodna prodazhba,pakuvani vo filter vrekichki. Analizirani bea isto taka i infuzi od matochina, kantarion ikopriva podgotveni od lekoviti rastenija sobrani voMaleshevskite Planini. Podgotovka na infuzite: 0,5g suvo issitneto rastenie se prelivaso 50mL vrela voda i se ostava da stoi 15 minuti vo pokrien sad,posle shto se protseduva i se analizira. Vkupnata sodrzhina na antioksidansi beshe odreduvana so FRAPmetodata, spored Benzie i Strain. Metodata e bazirana naprintsipot na reduktsija na feri- vo fero-jon pri niska pH, prishto se produtsira oboen fero-tripiridiltriazin kompleks kojapsorbira na 593nm. Rastvori od FeSO4 so poznata kontsentratsijabea koristeni kako standardi. Kontsentratsijata na vkupniteantioksidansi e izrazena kako mmol/L FeSO4.REZULTATIRezultatite od nashite merenja ushte ednash ja potvrdija visokatasodrzhina na vkupnite antioksidansi vo infuzot podgotven odzeleniot chaj: 25,2mmol/L. Od ostanatite ispituvani lekovitirastenija, infuzot od matochina (Good Nature, Alkaloid) isto takapokazha osobeno visoka vrednost na vkupni antioksidansi, mnogubliska so taa od zeleniot chaj: matochina - 19,2mmol/L. Sodrzhinatana vkupnite antioksidansi vo infuzite podgotveni od ostanatiteispituvani makedonski lekoviti rastenija od Good Nature,Alkaloid, iznesuvashe: kantarion - 8,5mmol/L; lipa - 6,1mmol/L;kopriva - 2,9mmol/L. Infuzite podgotveni od matochina i kopriva sobrani od Ma le shev -skite Planini dadoa slichni rezultati kako i komertsijalnite lek -o v iti rastenija: matochina - 19,5mmol/L; kopriva - 3,7mmol/L.Iskluchok pretstavuvashe infuzot podgotven od kantarion od Ma le -shev skite Planini, koj imashe neshto povisoka sodrzhina na vkupnianti oksidansi vo odnos na komertsijalniot: kantarion - 12,6mmol/L.ZAKLUChOKPokraj dobro poznatite lekoviti dejstva na nashite mnogu chestokoristeni lekoviti rastenija: matochina, kantarion, lipa ikopriva, od osobeno znachenje e i nivnata sodrzhina na vkupniantioksidansi koja ima potentsijal da pridonese za namaluvanje nasodrzhinata na slobodnite radikali, a so toa i za podobruvanje naoksidativniot status na organizmot.Vo ovoj kontekst znachajno e da se istaknat i nashite pretkhodnoobjaveni podatotsi za nivoto na vkupni antioksidansi vo kherbalniinfuzi pogodni za neogranichena sekojdnevna upotreba (4), koi istotaka bi mozhele da pridonesat za namaluvanje na oksidativniotstres.LITERATURA1. J Nutr. 133:2812-19. 4. Ruskovska, T., Gjorgieva, D., Crcoroska, M. and Kukovska, V., (2011): Totalantioxidants level in caffeine-free herbal infusions suitable for unrestrictedeveryday use. B., (2010): Totalphenolic contents and antioxidant capacities of selected chinese medicinal plants.Int J Mol Sci. 11:2362-72.VARIATIONS IN THE ESSENTIAL OIL CHARAC-TERISTICS OF SATUREJA MONTANA L.(LAMI-ACEAE) DEPENDING ON ENVIRONMENTALCONDITIONS AND PHENOLOGICAL STAGE Violeta Slavkovska1, Mihailo Ristic2, Branislava Lakusic1 and Dmitar Lakusic31Department of Botany, Faculty of Pharmacy, University of Belgrade, Serbia2Institute for Medicinal Plant Research "Dr Josif Pancic", Belgrade, Serbia3Institute of Botany and Botanical Garden "Jevremovac", Faculty of Biology, University of Belgrade, SerbiaSatureja montana L. is a perennial semi-shrub growing wild in south-ern Europe, the Caucasus and northern Africa [1]. This aromaticspecies is frequently used as a traditional medicinal plant. With regardto the presence of phenolic compounds, S. montana is known toposses certain pharmacological activities [2-5]. The present study de-scribes the content, chemical composition and compositional varia-tions of the essential oil at different phenological stages of Saturejamontana L. transferred from natural habitat to Belgrade. Two sub-species S. montana subsp. montana and S. montana subsp. pisidica(Wettst.) Silic were included in the analysis. The essential oil was obtained from the aerial parts of the plant by hy-drodistillation and analyzed by gas chromatography (GC/FID and GC/MS). S. montana subsp. montana exhibited the lowest oil content in thepre-flowering stage (0.5%) and the highest in the flowering stage (1.2%).With the development of fruit and seeds the oil content dropped from0.9% to 0.6%. Plants gathered in natural habitats exhibited the sametrend. The main constituent in the oil of the cultivated plants in thepre-flowering stage was thymol (48.9%), whose concentration in theremaining phenological stages varies between 2% and 3%. Linalool(50%-75.6%) was the dominant component in the oils isolated fromplants in the flowering, fruiting and full fruiting stages. The concen-tration of linalool in oil of plants in the pre-flowering stage was only1.1%.
